replies.body:
For the hextech change,

what happens if u already have an ultimate skin before the update?
does it still need 2950 OE?

Yeah can confirm cause this just happened to me! Got PROJECT: Vayne skin dropped in a chest a short time ago, along comes this patch and.. yep, I'll still be saving up orange essence for the rest of the year to unlock it. No retroactive love on this change. :(

Project Vayne isn't an ultimate or mythic skin and so wouldn't be eligible anyway.

Ultimates are Pulsefire Ez, SG Udyr, DJ Sona and Elementalist Lux. Mythics are Hextech Crafting skins (e.g Soulstealer Vayne or Hextech Kog) and Neo Pax Sivir (though I believe you can no longer receive the skin from chests anyway).

Project Vayne is a legendary tier.
only counts for shards you get after this change so no shards you got before will be free.

{{sticker:sg-shisa}} IM SO SAD BEACAUSE I LITTERALLY RECIEVED A SKIN SHARD FOR DJ SONA 2 DAYS BEFORE 8.5 AND NOW WE'RE SUDDENLY GETTING THE DROP FROM CHESTS AS A FREE PERMANENT??!? at least discount them for us plzzzz ritooo 2950 is a lot of essence to save and collect {{sticker:sg-janna}}
got dj sona as well like a week before the update

> Demon Flare now passes through champions. Effects like Yasuo's E - Windwall

Think you meant Yasuo's W
How is riot casual with all these errors?
So wheres the new champ and the open parties feature?. Im on the client and don't see nothing

honestly, we are probably waiting on all regions to patch (NA isn't due for another 7 hours)
So expect her to show up tomorrow
Swain's E is the same picture as his W. I'll say it again, make me the editor
"Now that we've taken away Zoe's oppressive strengths, we're looking to put power back in her !!!!!!!!!!!kid!!!!!!!!!!! where it's appropriate"
Since when was yasuo's e windwall?{{champion:157}}

I haven't played this game in months but from what I'm reading, this game is still the same from before. Riot is buffing/nerfing champs like its going out of fashion, they are still ignoring the community that wants the Crystal Scar back in customs so they can play hide and seek and they still haven't made URF a permanent game mode for either the main game or customs. furthermore, you still can't edit things in custom games such as gold income per second, walk speed, minions off etc etc. 

Am I missing anything? I hope at least the community isn't as toxic as before.

Riot please can you try and Nerf Yi ... 
he heals way too much and the damage reduction is insane
his ability to become untargetable while dealing very high damage is extremely annoying and having it on such a short cool down really makes him op.

Swains deaths hand ability is way to spamable and does too much damage 
his ultimate allows to leech health too easily

Ziggs needs to get his are fixed because there isn't really an adventure to having a massive range ultimate if the longer you throw it the bigger the delay at max rank its about 4-6 seconds which allows the enemy to simply walk out of it

Please fix this
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

If you are having issues with Yi wrecking you, get some cc.

If Swains snare has got you locked down, dodge it (it is decently slow) from mid-long range.

Ziggs ult is meant for that reason.. you need to predict.

Riot, I love the way you actually hotfix problems you see.  Just please update the in-game items aswell.. The support items still state they grant bandit, and don't state the passive gold gen lock out.

Effects like Yasuo's E - Windwall
w a t
OE? Orange Essence? Isn't that a thing of the past?

Uh, I'm a little confused re: "CHEAPER MASTERY Champion mastery 6 cost will be reduced by 800BE to 2450BE. Champion mastery 7 will be reduced by 950BE from 2950BE." So M6 will be reduced to 2450BE (a reduction of 800BE from current cost) and M7 will be reduced to 2950BE (a reduction of 950BE from current cost)?
Yes :)
When will there be mecha zero sion chrome skins?
Mythical now drops as permanent?? Can I have my thousands of orange essence back?

Rengar's E is bola strike. Why, riot-?
Because Rengar is ebola and nothing more. Nice buffs

And the broken stopwatch selling for more gold then it is worth is still a bug.......... HELL YEH i guess that can continue to annoy me as i attempt to spend gold that is not there for the next couple of patches, better fix those chogath SFXs though ;)

> Now that we've taken away Zoe's oppressive strengths, we're looking to put power back in her **kid** where it's appropriate. 

Is that a pun or a typo?
